mean_en: an angry statement in which you accuse or criticize a person who has accused or criticized you
word_etyma: re 相反+ crimin 罪 + ation 表名词→ 反责，反控；揭丑
short_phrase: recrimination and fighting among the men
sentence: After our team lost the game, there was a lot of recrimination among the players.
sentence_trans: 我们队输掉游戏之后，玩家们各种互相攻击。
